title: change tooltip size
body: I was wondering if there was any way to change the tooltip size. I saw a few people in the past asking about it, but I didn't see any answers that didn't involve editing files. I recently bought a 27" monitor and now the tooltips feel like they take up a ton of room. I'd like them to be smaller so they take up less space, but to the point I can still read them.

replies.body:
Is your new monitor a 4K?  Regardless, your settings might not have adjusted to your new monitor, but a config reset should help here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

You'll want to make sure that you in-game settings and native resolution are matching and not exceeding 1920x1080.

It's still a 1920x1080 monitor. I did that but it still seems big. It may be the correct size, I just wish there was an option to adjust the tooltip size.

Here's what it looks like (if you can see the link) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Asti0zO5qzPbtPUnvJk1QjIbixuTdkMp/view?usp=sharing
